languages.text: "В общем, были мы один раз на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}... ну то есть Лорд-капитан Теодора на Футфоле часто бывала, а тут меня с собой потащила с какой-то целью. У меня еще с утра день не задался, башка трещала, но делать нечего — пришлось идти. Приходим мы в место — притон притоном, все господа и дамы расфуфыренные, с {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантами{/g} инкрустированными, сидят кучками за столами... в общем, выяснилось, что это игральный дом, да не простой, а заведенный кем-то из толстосумов для таких же, с деньжищами. Знали бы вы, как это, когда у тебя на глазах в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g} планету проигрывают! В общем, Лорд-капитан хотела, чтобы я ей помогла обставить одного типа... я ей говорю: пить дать, фишка не ляжет, фигура не пойдет, не садитесь за стол, Ваша Светлость! Она ни в какую — вот чего ей было не занимать, так это упорства".

traits.locale_text: "В общем, были мы один раз на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}... ну то есть Лорд-капитан Теодора на Футфоле часто бывала, а тут меня с собой потащила с какой-то целью. У меня еще с утра день не задался, башка трещала, но делать нечего — пришлось идти. Приходим мы в место — притон притоном, все господа и дамы расфуфыренные, с {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантами{/g} инкрустированными, сидят кучками за столами... в общем, выяснилось, что это игральный дом, да не простой, а заведенный кем-то из толстосумов для таких же, с деньжищами. Знал{mf||а} бы ты, как это, когда у тебя на глазах в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g} планету проигрывают! В общем, Лорд-капитан хотела, чтобы я ей помогла обставить одного типа... я ей говорю: пить дать, фишка не ляжет, фигура не пойдет, не садитесь за стол, ваша милость! Она ни в какую — вот чего ей было не занимать, так это упорства."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."
languages.original_text: "В общем, были мы один раз на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}... ну то есть Лорд-капитан Теодора на Футфоле часто бывала, а тут меня с собой потащила с какой-то целью. У меня еще с утра день не задался, башка трещала, но делать нечего — пришлось идти. Приходим мы в место — притон притоном, все господа и дамы расфуфыренные, с {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантами{/g} инкрустированными, сидят кучками за столами... в общем, выяснилось, что это игральный дом, да не простой, а заведенный кем-то из толстосумов для таких же, с деньжищами. Она ни в какую — вот чего ей было не занимать, так это упорства".

All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favor, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Grace! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

languages.text: “好了，这么说吧，我们有一次去了{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}……呃，我是说，西奥多拉领主舰长经常去落脚港，但有一次，出于某种原因，她把我也带上了。我那天过得很糟糕，早上一醒过来，脑子里就一直在嗡嗡响，但我也没别的办法，只能硬着头皮去。等我们到了那个地方之后，哎哟，那是个什么样的地方啊！所有的绅士与淑女都穿着光鲜亮丽的衣服，炫耀着他们镶嵌的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。所有人都簇拥在小桌子旁边……原来那是个赌场，而且并不是普通的赌场，而是某个腰缠万贯的人经营的赌场，有无数现金可以挥霍。你真应该看看当时的情形，那群人在一盘{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}上押上了好几颗行星！总之，领主舰长希望我能帮她打败某个人……于是我告诉她：‘那堆筹码你恐怕赢不到手’，‘你会拿到一手烂牌’，或是‘别坐在那张桌子旁边，夫人！’但她听吗？她当然不会听了。如果说有什么东西她从来都不缺，那就是她的固执。”
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to Footfall once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted implants, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of regicide! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

languages.text: «Vale, a ver, estuvimos en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} una vez... bueno, quiero decir, la Lord Capitán Theodora iba mucho a Paso, pero en aquella ocasión me llevó con ella por algún motivo. Mi día había empezado con mal pie; las voces no dejaban de berrear desde que desperté, pero no había nada que hacer: tenía que ir. Llegamos a aquel sitio, ¡y qué sitio! Todos los caballeros y las damas con sus galas más elegantes, mostrando sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} incrustados, reunidos alrededor de unas mesitas... Bueno, resultó que era una casa de apuestas, y no una cualquiera, sino una regentada por una persona podrida de millones y para gente con carteras equiparables a la suya. Debería haberlo visto: ¡la gente apostaba planetas enteros en partidas de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g}! En fin, el caso es que la Lord Capitán quería que la ayudara a ganar a un hombre... y le dije "no va a tener suerte, le va a tocar una mala mano, ¡no se siente en esa mesa, milady!". ¿Y me escuchó? Pues claro que no. Era cabezona como la que más».
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

Mi día había empezado con mal pie; las voces no dejaban de berrear desde que desperté, pero no había nada que hacer: tenía que ir. Llegamos a aquel sitio, ¡y qué sitio! Todos los caballeros y las damas con sus galas más elegantes, mostrando sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} incrustados, reunidos alrededor de unas mesitas... Bueno, resultó que era una casa de apuestas, y no una cualquiera, sino una regentada por una persona podrida de millones y para gente con carteras equiparables a la suya. Debería haberlo visto: ¡la gente apostaba planetas enteros en partidas de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g}! En fin, el caso es que la Lord Capitán quería que la ayudara a ganar a un hombre... y le dije "no va a tener suerte, le va a tocar una mala mano, ¡no se siente en esa mesa, milady!". ¿Y me escuchó? Pues claro que no. Era cabezona como la que más».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そうね、あたいたちは一度、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}へ向かったわ…その、ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラはしょっちゅうフットフォールに行ってたんだけど、そのときはなぜかあたいを連れて行ったの。その日は最悪のスタートで、目が覚めてからずっと頭がきしんでいた。だけどあたいは行かなければならなかった。あたいたちはその場所に到着したの…あの場所に！紳士も淑女も皆、殺伐とした服装で、ちりばめられた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}を見せびらかし、小さなテーブルの周りに集まっていた…ただの賭博場ではなく…同じように大枚をはたく人々のために、腹を肥やした誰かが経営している場所だったの。陛下も一度見てみるべきよ…{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}でギャンブルにすべてを費やしている人々をね！とにかく、ロード・キャプテンはあたいに、ある男を倒すのを手伝ってほしいと言ったわ。だからあたいは彼女に言ったの。チップはあなたに有利にはならないし、配られる手札は不利なもの。だから、そのテーブルには座るなって！でも、彼女は聞いていたのかしら？彼女に欠点があるとすれば、あの頑固さなのは間違いないわ」
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Okay, wir waren mal in {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ... Also, Lord Captain Theodora reiste oft nach Footfall, doch dieses Mal nahm sie mich aus irgendeinem Grund mit. Mein Tag hatte schlecht begonnen, mir dröhnte der Kopf schon beim Aufwachen, doch es half nichts, ich musste mitgehen. Wir kommen also dort an — und es ist atemberaubend! All die Damen und Herren tragen ihr feinstes Gewand und präsentieren ihre vergoldeten {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g}. Sie sitzen um kleine Tische gedrängt ... Tja, es war eine Spielhölle, aber nicht irgendeine, sondern organisiert von Leuten mit sehr tiefen Taschen, für Leute, die ebenso viel Geld zum Verpulvern haben. Ihr hättet es sehen sollen, die Leute haben am {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g}-Tisch ganze Planeten verzockt! Jedenfalls sollte ich dem Lord Captain dabei helfen, gegen irgendeinen Typen zu gewinnen ... Also sage ich ihr: Die Chips werden nicht zu Euren Gunsten fallen, Ihr werdet ein schlechtes Blatt erhalten, setzt Euch nicht an diesen Tisch, Euer Ladyschaft! Aber hat sie auf mich gehört? Natürlich nicht — wenn es ihr an einem nie mangelte, dann an Sturheit."
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, une fois, on est allés à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}... Enfin, la seigneure-capitaine Théodora allait souvent à Castel, hein, mais cette fois-là, elle avait décidé de m'emmener, allez savoir pourquoi. Ma journée avait mal commencé ; je m'étais réveillée avec une migraine de tous les diables, mais il fallait que j'y aille, un point c'est tout. Donc on arrive sur place, et c'était absolument incroyable ! Tous ces messieurs et ces dames sur leur trente-et-un, avec leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} incrustés de pierres précieuses, agglutinés autour de petites tables... Il se trouve que c'était un casino, et pas n'importe lequel. C'était celui d'un gros nabab, réservé à ceux qui avaient les poches aussi pleines que lui. Vous auriez vu ça ! Les gens pariaient des planètes entières dans des parties de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} ! Bref, la seigneure-capitaine voulait que je l'aide à battre un type au jeu... Alors je la préviens : la partie ne sera pas en votre faveur, Votre Seigneurie ; ne vous asseyez pas à cette table, vous aurez une mauvaise main ! Mais est-ce qu'elle m'a écoutée ? Bien sûr que non. Ah ça, on peut dire que dans le genre têtu, elle se posait là. »
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, une fois, on est allés à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}... Enfin, la seigneure-capitaine Théodora allait souvent à Castel, hein, mais cette fois-là, elle avait décidé de m'emmener, allez savoir pourquoi. Ma journée avait mal commencé ; je m'étais réveillée avec une migraine de tous les diables, mais il fallait que j'y aille, un point c'est tout. Donc on arrive sur place, et c'était absolument incroyable ! Tous ces messieurs et ces dames sur leur trente-et-un, avec leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} incrustés de pierres précieuses, agglutinés autour de petites tables... Il se trouve que c'était un casino, et pas n'importe lequel. C'était celui d'un gros nabab, réservé à ceux qui avaient les poches aussi pleines que lui. Vous auriez vu ça ! Les gens pariaient des planètes entières dans des parties de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} ! Bref, la seigneure-capitaine voulait que je l'aide à battre un type au jeu... Alors je la préviens : la partie ne sera pas en votre faveur, Votre Seigneurie ; ne vous asseyez pas à cette table, vous aurez une mauvaise main ! Mais est-ce qu'elle m'a écoutée ? Bien sûr que non. Ah ça, on peut dire que dans le genre têtu, elle se posait là. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ... Bir ara {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'a{/g} gitmiştik. Yani Lord Kaptan Theodora, Binliman'a sıkça giderdi ama bu ziyaretinde nedense beni de yanına almıştı. Neyse, ben o güne zaten kötü başlamıştım. Uyandığımdan beridir başım çatlıyordu ama elden ne gelir... Tıpış tıpış gidecektim. Derken mekâna vardık ama mekân da mekân hani! Kadını erkeği herkes iki dirhem bir çekirdek, süslü püslü {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantları{/g} ile caka satıyorlar. Küçük masaların etrafında toplanmışlar. Meğerse burası kumarhaneymiş ama sıradan bir kumarhane de değil yani. İşletmecisi de tıpkı içeride para saçanlar gibi bir para babası. Görmen lazımdı. Millet {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} oyununda bahis diye ortaya gezegen koyuyordu! Her neyse, Lord Kaptan benden adamın tekini yenmesine yardım etmemi istedi. Ben de dedim ki: Leydi Hazretleri; çipler sizden yana olmayacak, eliniz kötü gelecek, o masaya oturmayın! Beni dinledi mi peki? Tabii ki hayır! Asla eksikliğini çekmediği bir şey varsa o da inadıydı zaten."
languages.original_text: "Okay, so, we went to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} once... well, I mean, Lord Captain Theodora went to Footfall a lot, but on that occasion, she took me with her for some reason. My day had gotten off to a bad start, my head had been yammering since I woke up, but there was nothing else for it — I had to go. We arrive at the place — and what a place! All the gentlemen and ladies dressed to kill, showing off their encrusted {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, all clustered around little tables... Well, turned out it was a gaming den, and not just any gaming den, but one run by somebody with deep pockets for people with just as much cash to splash. You should have seen it — people gambling away planets in a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}! Anyway, so the Lord Captain wanted me to help her beat some guy... So I tell her: the chips won't land in your favour, you'll get a bad hand, don't sit down at that table, Your Ladyship! But did she listen? Of course she didn't — if there's one thing she never lacked, it's stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ... Şimdi, bir ara {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'a gitmiştik. Yani şey... Tabii ki Lord Kaptan Theodora Binliman'a çokça gitmişti ama bu hadisede nedense yanına beni de almıştı. Neyse, ben o güne zaten kötü başlamıştım. Uyandığım andan itibaren beynimde kopan yaygaralar susmamıştı ama elimden bir şey gelmiyordu. Yola koyulmalıydım. Biz mekâna vardık ama mekân da mekân hani! Kadını erkeği herkes iki dirhem bir çekirdek, süslü püslü {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g}ı ile caka satıyorlar. Hepsi küçük masaların etrafında toplanmış. Meğer biz bir tür kumarhaneye gelmişiz ama sıradan bir kumarhane de değil yani. İşletmecisi, tıpkı kendisi gibi para babaları paralarını döke saça harcasınlar diye uğraşıyor. Görmen lazımdı. Millet {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} oyununda gidip gezegenlerin üzerine bahis koyuyordu! Her neyse, sonra Lord Kaptan benden adamın tekini yenmesine yardım etmemi istedi. Ben de ona dedim ki: Leydi Hazretleri, çiplerden fayda görmeyeceksiniz, eliniz kötü olacak ve o masaya oturmayın! Peki beni dinledi mi? Tabii ki hayır! Kendisinde asla eksik olmayan bir huy varsa o da inadıydı zaten."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
